This package provides client interfaces to the Unlock web services for place search and extraction of geographic names from text.

http://unlock.edina.ac.uk/api.html - API documentation in full

Jo Walsh is the author of this package.

EDINA is a JISC National Datacentre located in Edinburgh, Scotland UK, which provides data services across UK Higher and Further Education - http://www.edina.ac.uk/ 

EDINA is supported by JISC - the Joint Information Systems Committee
